name: ProVoc Database File
summary: A PVOC file is a ProVoc database created by iVocabulary, a macOS app used to manage and learn vocabulary words. It contains one or more libraries of vocabulary terms and definitions. PVOC files also store metadata , such as the author of the vocabulary collection and source and target languages of the terms.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
